Android Bootstrap Docs

Kaodim Android Design Bootstrap

Download

Currently v0.0.2

Overview

This is the Kaodim android design bootstrap documentation for setting up and maintaining Kaodim shared UI components

Installation

Install Design Library

Integrate with Gradle

Typography

All typography formats have been declared in the styles.xml file

Title 1 - 22sp - Roboto Bold Title 2 - 20sp - Roboto Bold

Components

Re-usable Custom Android UI Components that are added to the XML layout and optionally controlled by the code-behind.

NumericControl

Commonly used for Numeric and Multi Numeric Questions where a numeric increment and decrement option is given for numeric input selection.

DateTimePickerDialog

A custom Date and Time selection control with customizable behavior controls for toggling cycle effect, atmospheric effect, etc.

Date Time Picker Component

A picker component will be added to the interface and upon tapping this component, the date time picker dialog will be called.

Date Time Picker Dialog

Initializing DateTimePicker

It is important to call initialize(activity) before using the DateTimePicker as the calling activity is necessary to call the DateTimePickerDialog.

Setting DateTimeChangedListener

A callback with the selected date and time is made if a DateTimeChangedListener is set to the DateTimePicker component after initializing

Or if the activity/fragment implements it, set the DateTimeChangedListener like this:

Additionally, the start time and end time of the date picker can be set. This will be the range of the time picker.

InteractivePanel

InteractivePanel allows you to set a custom text and receive onClick callbacks from it. This can be used as a replacement for a selection button.

Dotted Border

Line Border

Code level

Set Listeners

Set a listener using:

SearchBox

SearchBox is an extension of an Interactive Panel where the user can tap on the search box button to receive a callback. Additionally, a search box button has a 'next' button implementation which has a callback of its own. The next button can be toggled as enabled and disabled to toggle visibility.

Callbacks

Set Attributes from code level

Visibility of the next button and the hint can be changed from code level.

TermsBar

Terms bar is a component that includes the design for terms and privacy links in the Kaodim app. Callbacks are provided when the user interacts with the links.

Set the privacyText, termsText and titleText to control the text for different translations. Default english text has been added to the component.

Callbacks

MobileInputMockLayout

MobileInputMockLayout is used to mock a mobile input but for use cases where a transition is necessary to be performed to another layout where an actual mobile input is presented to the user. This is primarily a mock layout that provides a callback for user click events that allows the developer to then perform any click events to other activities. As an example, two use cases that use this layout can be found in:

  • VendorLandingActivity in Vendor app
  • LandingActivity in User app

Initialization

This component comes in-built with a country selection dropdown. An initialization from the code-level is necessary to provide the component with a Context. Therefore, in the onCreate of your activity, initialize this component as follows.

Callbacks
